summary: Diff adds an Advanced Contact Lookup reporting UI (result-card action + dialog), offline cache usage in lookup, service worker precache for the public dataset, new i18n keys, and updates the production verification checklist. However, report submission appears to be implemented as a simulated localStorage-only flow rather than using the existing report submission dialog/submission mechanism, and category mapping to the existing report category model is not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the existing report submission dialog flow to submit an anonymous report from Advanced Contact Lookup results.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff introduces a new hook that explicitly simulates submission and stores reports in localStorage instead of using an existing report submission mechanism/flow. This does not match the requirement to use the existing report submission dialog flow.

missing_requirements.requirement: Submit the selected tag using the existing report category model (mapping to existing categories where applicable), while showing only Spam/Phishing/Scam/Other.
missing_requirements.reason: The dialog collects a string category ('Spam'|'Phishing'|'Scam'|'Other') and passes it through to submission, but the diff summary provides no evidence of mapping to the appâ€™s existing report category types/model for compatibility.

hallucinated_features.description: Simulated report submission with artificial delay and persistence to localStorage under 'anonymous_reports'.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; the requirement calls for using the existing reporting flow, not a demo/localStorage-backed submission implementation.
